select `p`.`id`, `p`.`user_id`, `p`.`subject`, `p`.`brand`, `p`.`photo`, `p`.`photo2`, `p`.`photo3`, `p`.`photo4`, `p`.`createdtime`, `p`.`expiredtime`, `p`.`expiredhour`, p.expiredtime - 1511840910  as remaintime, `p`.`like1`, `p`.`like2`, `p`.`like3`, `p`.`like4`, `p`.`like5`, `p`.`like6`, `p`.`like7`, `p`.`like8`, `p`.`like9`, `p`.`like10`, `p`.`like11`, `p`.`like12`, `u`.`first_name`, `u`.`last_name`, `u`.`avatar`, (select like1 from likes where user_id  =  269952830180633  and post_id = p.id) as me1, (select like2 from likes where user_id  =  269952830180633  and post_id = p.id) as me2, (select like3 from likes where user_id  =  269952830180633  and post_id = p.id) as me3, (select like4 from likes where user_id  =  269952830180633  and post_id = p.id) as me4, (select like5 from likes where user_id  =  269952830180633  and post_id = p.id) as me5, (select like6 from likes where user_id  =  269952830180633  and post_id = p.id) as me6, (select like7 from likes where user_id  =  269952830180633  and post_id = p.id) as me7, (select like8 from likes where user_id  =  269952830180633  and post_id = p.id) as me8, (select like9 from likes where user_id  =  269952830180633  and post_id = p.id) as me9, (select like10 from likes where user_id  =  269952830180633  and post_id = p.id) as me10, (select like11 from likes where user_id  =  269952830180633  and post_id = p.id) as me11, (select like12 from likes where user_id  =  269952830180633  and post_id = p.id) as me12 from `posts` as `p` inner join `users` as `u` on `u`.`name` = `p`.`user_id` where `p`.`expiredtime` > '1511840910' and `p`.`user_id` in ('269952830180633', '853933541454466', '10155185349426747', '1699569926762626', '10214584181977149') order by `remaintime` asc
